description: - Created and maintained 10+ web applications for numerous national and foreign clients.
- Worked with a committee of 6 members to organize fun-activities for the employees.
- Mobilized cross-platform testing on 4 different web browsers and 3 standalone applications in web and cloud base.
- Setup tracking with GTM and GA, integrated HTML/CSS into the CMS and conducted day-to-day maintenance of the websites, resulting in a combined $40M of revenue for clients.
- Launched a company-wide digitized filing system that led to an increase in efficiency for all departments by 20% on average.
- Developed 50 responsive websites for clients in a variety of industries.
- Contributed to the development of over 10 web and mobile applications.
- Performed full cycle recruiting, averaging 100+ interviews per month.
- Collaborated with marketing and project management teams to deliver projects on-time and with the highest standard, retaining over 98% of clients in a 5-year period.
- Extensive and varied contributions to the company's internal backend framework with a team of 4+ developers.

education.description: UMS is another university located in Borneo, focusing on biodiversity and environmental research. It offers programs in fields such as marine science, sustainable agriculture, tropical medicine, and business.
Located in Munich, LMU is one of Europe's premier research universities, offering a wide range of academic disciplines across faculties such as humanities, sciences, and medicine.

overview: 1. Proficiency in JavaScript: I have a strong understanding and command over the JavaScript programming language. This includes knowledge of JavaScript's syntax, control flow, functions, and libraries.
2. Front-End Frameworks: Familiarity with popular Front-End frameworks like Bootstrap, Material-UI, or Tailwind CSS is mine.
